"Rediah": "Very well, I will now tell you about the \"Mission Pass\"."
"The Mission Pass is a mechanism whereby you complete certain tasks to progress through various \"Tiers\", each of which bestow rewards."
"You advance Tiers by accumulating \"Stars\", which are acquired through activities like completing Daily Tasks and Weekly Tasks."

"Additionally, you can obtain even better rewards with a \"Premium Set\"
or an \"N-Mission Gold Pass\"."
"Furthermore, the Mission Pass is split up into active periods known as \"Seasons\"."
"Please try to obtain the rewards you want before the Mission Pass moves into another Season."
"Why not take a look at the Mission Pass and see what it's like for yourself?"
